name: Corona Chorus
details:
TonePrint-Enabled Chorus Pedal with 2 Built-In ChorusesHigh-quality TonePrint-enabled chorus pedal offers you 2 outstanding built-in chorus effects
Renowned SCF Chorus and lush TriChorus settings included out of the box provide truly exceptional tonal options to create with
Four-knob interface allows extensive tonal tweaking while remaining highly intuitive to let you focus on playing
True stereo I/O provides incredibly wide three-dimensional tones
TonePrint-enabled to let you beam cool signature tones into your pedal with the free TonePrint App
Design your own customized chorus effects from scratch with free TonePrint Editor for PC, Mac*, and iPad*
True bypass allows for optimum clarity and zero high-end loss when the pedal is off
Optional buffered bypass mode prevents high frequency loss from long cable runs
Analog-Dry-Through maintains total integrity of analog dry signal path even when chorus effect is engaged
Kill-Dry feature removes the dry signal path for use with parallel effects loops
Easy one-screw battery compartment access
Extra-small footprint easily fits on any pedal board
3-Year Warranty Program*
Designed and engineered in Denmark
